advancement.destroy.aging_barrel.descrip: 使用陈酿桶来酿造饮品
advancement.destroy.baby_blue_high.descr: 在蓝精灵的效果下腾空至1000格
advancement.destroy.beetroot_potato_cann: 用土豆加农炮射出变异甜菜
advancement.destroy.capture_stray.descri: 使用空的烈焰人燃烧室捕捉流浪者
advancement.destroy.centrifuge.descripti: 用离心机分离两种流体
advancement.destroy.centrifuge_lubricate: 充分润滑离心机使其达到最高效率
使用发电机开始电解流体
advancement.destroy.every_explosive.desc: 合成出所有坍毁化合的爆炸物
advancement.destroy.every_plastic.descri: 合成出所有坍毁化合的塑料
advancement.destroy.fix_pollution.descri: 将完全污染的世界净化
advancement.destroy.hangover_cured.descr: 使用阿司匹林治愈宿醉
advancement.destroy.hyperaccumulate.desc: 使用超富集堆肥让作物变异
advancement.destroy.ostwald_process.desc: 在反应釜中用铑催化剂生成硝酸
advancement.destroy.sand_castle.descript: 毁掉小村民的沙堡，让它放声大哭
advancement.destroy.seismometer.descript: 用地震检波器发现虚空原油
advancement.destroy.tear_bottle.descript: 从哭泣的生物那收集眼泪用于制盐
advancement.destroy.urinate.description: 醉酒时在炼药锅上蹲着撒尿
advancement.destroy.vat.description: 在反应釜中让化学物质发生反应
badge.destroy.patreon_1.description: 在Patreon上成为第一档赞助者
badge.destroy.patreon_2.description: 走完7.77码，在Patreon上成为第二档赞助者
badge.destroy.patreon_3.description: 在Patreon上成为最高档赞助者，展现你的究极支持
badge.petrolpark.beta_tester.description: 帮助测试坍毁化合即将实装的特性
badge.petrolpark.content_creator.descrip: 以内容创作者的身份为坍毁化合免费推广
badge.petrolpark.developer.description: 为坍毁化合编辑材质或代码
badge.petrolpark.early_bird.description: B成为前1000名参与坍毁化合重大更新的玩家
badge.petrolpark.suggestion.description: 向坍毁化合提供过一个最终成功落实的点子
badge.petrolpark.translator.description: 为坍毁化合的本地化做出重大贡献
block.destroy.agar_block.tooltip.summary: 一种_营养丰富的_物质，非常适合各种_霉菌_，_细菌_和_真菌_的储存。
block.destroy.anfo_block.tooltip.summary: 一种可_完美地_采掘_矿物_的炸药。
block.destroy.anfo_block.tooltip.behavio: 对生物造成_极小伤害_并且_只_爆破石头和泥土，留下_完好的_矿石和装置。
block.destroy.cordite.tooltip.summary: 一种_蒸发_任何阻挡它的事物的炸药, 使其成为_远古残骸_开采的最佳选择。
block.destroy.cordite.tooltip.behaviour1: _蒸发_液体，无掉落物，对生物_造成极小伤害_ 。
block.destroy.dynamite_block.tooltip.sum: 这种炸药能_完美地_无痕_清理_区域。区域的_大小_和_形状_可以配置。
block.destroy.dynamite_block.tooltip.beh: 清理出一个_完美的长方体_（除了_无法破坏的_方块）并且不掉落物品。
block.destroy.extruded_cordite_block: 挤压后的线状无烟火药
block.destroy.nitrocellulose_block.toolt: 由于_高温强压_某些方块可能会有_特殊掉落物_。
这种_强力炸药_甚至可以在_水下_引爆。
block.destroy.pollutometer.tooltip.summa: 一种可以_定量测量_世界中的_污染_水平的超高科技设备。
block.destroy.pollutometer.tooltip.condi: 当用作显示链接器数据来源时
commands.destroy.babyblueaddiction.set.m: 已将%s级的蓝精灵瘾应用于%s
commands.destroy.babyblueaddiction.set.s: 已将%s级的蓝精灵瘾应用于玩家%s
commands.destroy.crudeoil: 已生成%s mB的原油储备于[%s, %s, %s]
death.attack.destroy.chemical_poison.unk: %1$s吸入了某些不该摄入的物质
destroy.chemistry.acid: 酸是能够将氢离子({protons, destroy:proton})贡献给其他物质的物质。它们与{bases, destroy:base}反应。
destroy.chemistry.addition: 加成反应是将一个基团加到一个{molecule, destroy:molecule}上的反应。
destroy.chemistry.addition_elimination: 加成-消除反应是将一个基团从{molecule, destroy:molecule}中移除，然后再加入另一个基团——这不同于{substitution, destroy:substitution}，两者同时发生。
destroy.chemistry.addition_polymer: 加成{polymers, destroy:polymer}不是{condensate, destroy:condensation_polymer}的副产物，往往是通过{free-radical, destroy:radical} {mechanism, destroy:mechanism}进行的。
destroy.chemistry.aldehyde: 醛是[destroy:carbonyl]的一种类型，其中羰基碳与至少一个氢{bonded, destroy:bond}，而不是{ketone, destroy:ketone}。
destroy.chemistry.alkane: 烷烃是一组只含有碳和氢的{molecules, destroy:molecule}，只含有单{bonds, destroy:bond}.
destroy.chemistry.aqua_regia: 拉丁文含义为“皇家水”，王水是 [destroy:nitric_acid]和[destroy:hydrochloric_acid]的混合物，可以{dissolve, destroy:solution} {noble, destroy:inert}金属，如金。
destroy.chemistry.atom: 原子是由{positive, destroy:charge} {nuclei, destroy:nucleus}包围着{negative, destroy:charge} {electrons, destroy:electron}组成的微小粒子。
destroy.chemistry.base: 碱基是能够接受来自其他物质的氢离子({protons, destroy:protons})的物质。它们与{acids, destroy:acid}反应。
destroy.chemistry.bond: 两个{atoms, destroy:atom}通过共享一对{electrons, destroy:electron}成键。原子的{positive, destroy:charge} {nuclei, destroy:nucleus}被吸引到{negative, destroy:charge} {electrons, destroy:electron}，需要大量的能量才能被拉开。
destroy.chemistry.carboxylation: 羧化反应是与[destroy:carbon_dioxide]的反应。它与{decarboxylation, destroy:decarboxylation}相反。
destroy.chemistry.charge: 电荷与质量一样，是一种先天属性。事物可以带正电或带负电，带相反电荷的事物会相互吸引，而带相同电荷的事物会相互排斥。
destroy.chemistry.catalyst: 催化剂是一种改变化学反应速率的物质，本身不被消耗。
destroy.chemistry.condensation_polymer: 缩合是{polymers, destroy:polymer}如DNA和尼龙“缩合为”一个小{molecule, destroy:molecule}，如[destroy:water]。
destroy.chemistry.cycle: 一个循环的{molecule, destroy:molecule}在其结构中至少有一个环。
destroy.chemistry.decarboxylation: 脱羧反应是从一个{molecule, destroy:molecule}中[destroy:carbon_dioxide]被{eliminated, destroy:elimination}的反应。它与{carboxylation, destroy:carboxylation}相反。
destroy.chemistry.degree: 度是指一个原子{bonded, destroy:bond}的碳{atoms, destroy:atom}的个数。例如，与另外两个碳原子成键的碳原子是"secondary" (具有二度性)。
destroy.chemistry.diene: 一个二烯体{molecule, destroy:molecule}至少包含两个{double bonds, destroy:double_bond}被一个{single bond, destroy:bond}分开。
destroy.chemistry.dienophile: 亲二烯体指的是{molecules, destroy:molecule}吸引到{dienes, destroy:diene}的物质。一些[destroy:alkene]和炔烃是亲二烯体。
destroy.chemistry.disproportionation: 歧化是指同一物质在一个反应中既是 {oxidized, destroy:oxidation} 又是{reduced, destroy:reduction}的反应。
destroy.chemistry.double_bond: 如果两个{atoms, destroy:atom}是双{bonded, destroy:bond}的，它们之间共享两对{electrons, destroy:electron}，而不是一对。
destroy.chemistry.electron: 电子是低质量的、{negatively, destroy:charge}移动到{subatomic, destroy:subatomic}粒子。
destroy.chemistry.electrophile: 亲电体是能够接受一个{electron, destroy:electron}对的物质。它们与{nucleophiles, destroy:nucleophile}相反。
destroy.chemistry.elimination: 消去反应是指从一个{molecule, destroy:molecule}中消去一个基团的反应。
destroy.chemistry.halogen: 卤素是一组元素，包括氟、[destroy:chlorine]、溴和[destroy:iodine]。
destroy.chemistry.hydrogenation: 氢化反应是一种{reduction, destroy:reduction}加[destroy:hydrogen]的反应。
destroy.chemistry.ion: 离子为{charged, destroy:charge} {atoms, destroy:atom}或{molecules, destroy:molecule}。
destroy.chemistry.ketone: 酮是[destroy:carbonyl]的一种类型，其中羰基碳与其他两个碳(不包括氢) {bonded, destroy:bond}，而不是{aldehyde, destroy:aldehyde}。
destroy.chemistry.mechanism: 机制描述了一个反应如何发生-{electrons, destroy:electron}移动方向与中间产物有哪些。
destroy.chemistry.mixed_xylenes: “混合二甲苯”是[destroy:metaxylene]、[destroy:orthoxylene]、[destroy:paraxylene]和[destroy:ethylbenzene]的混合物的名称。
destroy.chemistry.molecule: 分子包含多个{bonded, destroy:bond} {atoms, destroy:atom}。
destroy.chemistry.nucleophile: 亲核试剂是一种能够提供{electron, destroy:electron}对的物质。它们被吸引到{positive, destroy:charge}区域(因为{nuclei, destroy:nucleus}带正电而命名)。它们与{electrophiles, destroy:electrophile}相反。
destroy.chemistry.neutron: 中子是在一个{atom, destroy:atom}的{nucleus, destroy:nucleus}中发现的中性(不{charged, destroy:charge})粒子。
destroy.chemistry.nucleus: 在每个{atom, destroy:atom}的中心是一个原子核，由{protons, destroy:proton}和{neutrons, destroy:neutron}组成。
destroy.chemistry.oxidation: 一个{atom, destroy:atom}在失去{electron(s), destroy:electron}时被氧化，通常与[destroy:oxygen]反应。氧化与{reduction, destroy:reduction}相反。
destroy.chemistry.proton: 质子是在{nucleus, destroy:nucleus}中发现的{positive, destroy:charge} {subatomic, destroy:subatomic}粒子。一个{atom, destroy:atom}中质子的个数决定了它是什么元素。
destroy.chemistry.polarity: 一个极性{molecule, destroy:molecule}有一个{positive, destroy:charge端和一个{negative, destroy:charge}端。
destroy.chemistry.polymer: “聚合”是希腊语，意思为“许多”，因为聚合物是包含许多重复的“单体”的{molecules, destroy:molecule} 。塑料均为聚合物，类型包括{addition-, destroy:addition_polymer}和{condensation-, destroy:condensation_polymer}聚合物。
destroy.chemistry.precipitation: 沉淀来自从{solution, destroy:solution}溶解的物质。
destroy.chemistry.radical: 虽然大多数物质都含有成对{electrons, destroy:electron}，但是自由基是具有未成对电子的物种，并且通常具有很强的反应活性。
destroy.chemistry.radical_initiator: 自由基引发剂是产生{radicals, destroy:radical}并引发{polymerisation, destroy:polymer}反应的物质。
destroy.chemistry.reduction: 当一个{atom, destroy:atom}获得{electron(s), destroy:electron}时，该{atom, destroy:atom}减少。还原与{oxidation, destroy:oxidation}相反。
destroy.chemistry.sequestration: 碳封存是对温室气体的捕获，使其以固体或液体的形式储存。
destroy.chemistry.solution: 溶液中含有溶于溶剂的溶质。
destroy.chemistry.substitution: 取代反应是指一个{molecule, destroy:molecule}上的一个基团被另一个基团迅速取代的反应。
destroy.chemistry.subatomic: “亚原子”是指“比{atom, destroy:atom}更小”的粒子。
destroy.chemistry.thermal_decomposition: 热分解，或称热解，是物质受热时的自发分解。
destroy.chemistry.transalkylation: 烷基转移是{alkyl groups, destroy:alkane}在[destroy:benzene]环之间的转移。
destroy.chemistry.ultraviolet_catalysed_: 这个反应通过来自太阳、黑光灯或类似的光源方块的紫外线来{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst}。对反应瓮思索来了解更多。
destroy.chemistry.unknown_definition: 未知定义——请报告此漏洞。
destroy.ponder.tag.chemistry.description: Components which can be used to manipulate Mixtures
destroy.ponder.tag.destroy.description: Components and Curiosities added by Destroy
destroy.ponder.tag.vat_side_blocks.descr: Blocks from which Vats can be constructed
destroy.ponder.aging_barrel.header: Fermenting beverages with the Aging Barrel
destroy.ponder.aging_barrel.text_1: Aging Barrels, like Basins, can be filled with fluids and items.
destroy.ponder.aging_barrel.text_2: Over a long time, the Aging Barrel will create a new fluid.
destroy.ponder.aging_barrel.text_3: The Aging Barrel is also the workplace of the Innkeeper, who sells Yeast at the Apprentice level.
destroy.ponder.bubble_cap_generic.text_1: Vertically stacked Bubble Caps create a Distillation Tower.
destroy.ponder.bubble_cap_generic.text_2: Distillation Towers will automatically distill fluids in the bottom-most Cap (the Reboiler).
destroy.ponder.bubble_cap_generic.text_3: The higher the boiling point of the fluid, the further up the Tower it will travel.
destroy.ponder.bubble_cap_generic.text_4: Some Distillation recipes require a heater underneath the Reboiler.
destroy.ponder.bubble_cap_mixtures.text_: Distillation towers will distill any Mixtures.
You can see the temperature of the Reboiler with Goggles.
It can be increased with a Blaze Burner.
Species with a boiling point higher than this will remained mixed in the Reboiler.
Gases with a boiling point lower than room temperature will remain mixed in the top Cap.
All other species will form fractions according to their boiling point.
The more Bubble Caps, the more fractions.
All this allows you to separate species whose boiling points aren't too low or high.
Use a Display Link to more easily see the contents of a fraction.
destroy.ponder.centrifuge_generic.text_1: The Centrifuge will slowly separate any fluid pumped into the top.
destroy.ponder.centrifuge_generic.text_2: The denser resultant fluid can be extracted from the side.
destroy.ponder.centrifuge_generic.text_3: The lighter resultant fluid can be extracted from the bottom.
destroy.ponder.centrifuge_generic.text_4: The Centrifuge does not actively pump out fluids - a Mechanical Pump must be used.
destroy.ponder.centrifuge_generic.text_5: Lubrication can be applied to increase the processing speed.
destroy.ponder.centrifuge_mixture.text_1: Centrifuges can also be used to separate Mixtures into their component species, based on their densities.
destroy.ponder.centrifuge_mixture.text_2: They will always produce two products of equal volume.
destroy.ponder.centrifuge_mixture.text_3: Species are separated based on their liquid densities.
destroy.ponder.coaxial_gear_shaftless.he: Using Coaxial Cogwheels as shaftless Cogwheels
destroy.ponder.coaxial_gear_shaftless.te: Coaxial Cogwheels connect similarly to regular Cogwheels.
However, they have no Shaft, allowing for configurations that would be impossible with regular Cogwheels.
destroy.ponder.coaxial_gear_through.head: Rotating Shafts through Coaxial Cogwheels
destroy.ponder.coaxial_gear_through.text: Use a Coaxial Cogwheel on a Shaft to surround it.
You can also use a Shaft on a Coaxial Cogwheel.
In either case, there must be at least two Shaft blocks.
The Shaft rotates completely independently of the Coaxial Cogwheel.
They can even rotate at different speeds and in different directions.
destroy.ponder.cooler.text_1: Right-click a Stray with an Empty Blaze Burner to capture it.
destroy.ponder.cooler.text_2: Your new friend can be used to cool Basins.
destroy.ponder.cooler.text_3: Unlike the Blaze Burner, the Refrigerstraytor can only run off of Mixtures, piped in the bottom.
destroy.ponder.cooler.text_4: This Mixture must contain species with the 'Refrigerant' tag.
destroy.ponder.cooler.text_6: Higher-concentration refrigerants will keep the Refrigerstraytor cold for longer.
destroy.ponder.cooler.text_7: Once cold, it is required for some recipes.
destroy.ponder.differential.text_1: Differentials rotate at the average speed of the two input Shafts.
destroy.ponder.differential.text_2: When connected to a small Cog, this is effectively summing the two speeds.
destroy.ponder.differential.text_6: Shafts spinning in the opposite direction are treated like negative numbers.
destroy.ponder.differential.text_10: While connected to two Shafts, the Differential only transfers the stress to the large Cogwheel through one.
destroy.ponder.differential.text_13: If the outer gear is powered, the Differential will break.
destroy.ponder.double_cardan_shaft.heade: Relaying rotational force with Double Cardan Shafts
destroy.ponder.double_cardan_shaft.text_: Using two mechanisms called 'universal joints', Double Cardan Shafts can relay rotatation around a corner.
Use a Wrench to rotate them around the axis you clicked.
destroy.ponder.dynamo_redstone.header: Creating Redstone signals with the Dynamo
destroy.ponder.dynamo_redstone.text_1: A Dynamo will confer a Redstone signal to the block directly beneath.
destroy.ponder.dynamo_redstone.text_2: The strength of the signal is proportional to the rotational speed of the Dynamo.
destroy.ponder.dynamo_charging.text_1: The Dynamo can process items provided beneath it.
destroy.ponder.dynamo_charging.text_2: Items can be dropped or placed on a Depot underneath the Dynamo.
destroy.ponder.dynamo_electrolysis.text_: A Dynamo placed two blocks above a Basin can be used to carry out electrolysis recipes.
destroy.ponder.extrusion_die.header: Extruding blocks with the Extrusion Die
destroy.ponder.extrusion_die.text_1: The Extrusion Die can transform some blocks when they are pushed through it.
destroy.ponder.extrusion_die.text_2: The Extrusion Die must remain static.
destroy.ponder.reactions.text_1: Vats, and Basins with Mixers can be used to react Mixtures of chemicals.
destroy.ponder.reactions.text_2: Destroy simulates this on the Molecular level - reactions happen according to the real laws of chemistry.
destroy.ponder.reactions.text_3: For example, reactions can be sped up by increasing the temperature and concentration of reactants.
destroy.ponder.reactions.text_4: Use JEI to see the array of reactions possible. Hover over highlighted terms to see their definitions.
destroy.ponder.phytomining.text_1: Hyperaccumulating Fertilizer can be used like Bone Meal to mutate certain crops.
destroy.ponder.phytomining.text_2: Some mutations result in the uptake of ores placed a block below the farmland.
destroy.ponder.planetary_gearset.header: Out-of-this-world gearing with the Planetary Gearset
destroy.ponder.planetary_gearset.text_1: Planetary Gearsets connect almost identically to Large Cogwheels (press Q to learn more about these).
destroy.ponder.planetary_gearset.text_2: However, the Shaft of a Planetary Gearset rotates twice as fast, and in the opposite direction to the teeth.
destroy.ponder.pumpjack.header: Extracting Crude Oil with the Pumpjack
destroy.ponder.pumpjack.text_1: Locate Crude Oil with a Handheld Seismometer.
destroy.ponder.pumpjack.text_2: When powered anywhere in a chunk containing an oil reserve, the Pumpjack will slowly extract Crude Oil.
destroy.ponder.pumpjack.text_3: The Pumpjack does not actively pump out the Oil - a Mechanical Pump must still be used.
destroy.ponder.vat_construction.text_1: To make a Vat, first create an enclosed shell.
destroy.ponder.vat_construction.text_2: The only space should be for the Controller.
destroy.ponder.vat_construction.text_3: Vats can only be made out of certain blocks.
destroy.ponder.vat_construction.text_4: You can view all these blocks in the 'Vat Materials' section on the left.
destroy.ponder.vat_construction.text_5: These blocks can be combined in any way. What blocks you choose will affect the Vat's behaviour.
destroy.ponder.vat_construction.text_6: Vats can have many sizes, ranging from a single block of interior space...
destroy.ponder.vat_construction.text_8: They don't have to be cubic.
destroy.ponder.vat_construction.text_9: Like the blocks of which it's made, the shape and size of a Vat also affects its behaviour - for example, its capacity.
destroy.ponder.vat_construction.text_10: The edges of a Vat are not needed, and do not form part of the Vat.
destroy.ponder.vat_interaction.text_1: Use a Wrench on the outer side of a Vat to see its internal temperature.
destroy.ponder.vat_interaction.text_2: This does not work on the edges or corners.
destroy.ponder.vat_interaction.text_3: Wrench it again to see the pressure.
destroy.ponder.vat_interaction.text_4: Chemicals can be pulled and pushed from Vats with Fluid Pipes and Pumps.
destroy.ponder.vat_interaction.text_5: Pay close attention to the tooltip when hovering over a Pipe. If it is above the liquid level, it will only extract gas.
destroy.ponder.vat_interaction.text_6: Items can be pulled in and out through any side of the Vat.
destroy.ponder.vat_interaction.text_7: Wrench the top of a Vat to turn it into a vent. This will let out any gas and replace it with air.
destroy.ponder.vat_interaction.text_8: The vent can be opened and closed with redstone.
destroy.ponder.vat_interaction.text_9: Vats can be heated with Blaze Burners and cooled with Refrigerstrayters. This affects the rate of reactions.
destroy.ponder.uv.text_1: Some Reactions require ultraviolet light as a catalyst.
destroy.ponder.uv.text_2: Vats receive UV through transparent blocks in the top, regardless of the time of day.
destroy.ponder.uv.text_3: More UV power is supplied by Blacklights placed directly adjacent to transparent sides of the Vat.
destroy.generic_reaction.acyl_chloride_e: The joining of an [destroy:acyl_chloride] and an [destroy:alcohol] to make an [destroy:ester].
destroy.generic_reaction.acyl_chloride_f: The formation of an [destroy:acyl_chloride] from a [destroy:carboxylic_acid].
destroy.generic_reaction.acyl_chloride_h: The rapid reaction of an [destroy:acyl_chloride] with [destroy:water].
destroy.generic_reaction.alcohol_oxidati: The {oxidation, destroy:oxidation} of a non-{tertiary, destroy:degree} [destroy:alcohol] to a [destroy:carbonyl]. Carry out at low temperature to prevent further {oxidation, destroy:oxidation}.
destroy.generic_reaction.aldehyde_oxidat: The {oxidation, destroy:oxidation} of an {aldehyde, destroy:aldehyde} to a [destroy:carboxylic_acid].
destroy.generic_reaction.alkene_hydrolys: The {hydrolysis, destroy:hydrolysis} of an [destroy:alkene] to form an [destroy:alcohol]. The alcohol group gets added to the higher {degree, destroy:degree} carbon.
destroy.generic_reaction.alkene_hydrogen: The nickel-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} {hydrogenation, destroy:hydrogenation} of an [destroy:alkene].
destroy.generic_reaction.amide_hydrolysi: The {hydrolysis, destroy:hydrolysis} of an [destroy:amide] to produce a [destroy:carboxylic_acid].
destroy.generic_reaction.carbonyl_reduct: The {reduction, destroy:reduction} of a [destroy:carbonyl] to a [destroy:alcohol].
destroy.generic_reaction.carboxylic_acid: The {acid, destroy:acid}-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} joining of an [destroy:alcohol] and [destroy:carboxylic_acid] to make an [destroy:ester].
The {reduction, destroy:reduction} of a [destroy:carboxylic_acid] to an {aldehyde, destroy:aldehyde}. Carry out at low temperature to prevent further {reduction, destroy:reduction}.
destroy.generic_reaction.cyanide_nucleop: The {nucleophilic, destroy:nucleophile} {addition, destroy:addition} of [destroy:cyanide] to a [destroy:carbonyl].
destroy.generic_reaction.halide_amine_su: The {nucleophilic, destroy:nucleophile} {substitution, destroy:substitution} of a hydrogen from an [destroy:non_tertiary_amine] for an organo{halide, destroy:halide} (any {halide, destroy:halide}, not just a [destroy:chloride]).
destroy.generic_reaction.halide_ammonia_: The {nucleophilic, destroy:nucleophile} {substitution, destroy:substitution} of any organo{halide, destroy:halide} (not just a [destroy:chloride]) for an [destroy:amine] group.
destroy.generic_reaction.halide_cyanide_: The {nucleophilic, destroy:nucleophile} {substitution, destroy:substitution} of any organo{halide, destroy:halide} (not just a [destroy:chloride]) for an [destroy:nitrile] group.
destroy.generic_reaction.halide_hydroxid: The {nucleophilic, destroy:nucleophile} substitution of any organo{halide, destroy:halide} (not just a [destroy:chloride]) for an [destroy:alcohol] group.
destroy.generic_reaction.nitrile_hydroge: The nickel-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} {hydrogenation, destroy:hydrogenation} of a [destroy:nitrile] to produce an [destroy:amine].
destroy.generic_reaction.nitrile_hydroly: The {hydrolysis, destroy:hydrolysis} of a [destroy:nitrile] to produce an [destroy:amide].
destroy.reaction.abs_copolymerization.de: The {free-radical, destroy:radical} {addition copolymerization, destroy:addition_polymerization} of [destroy:acrylonitrile], [destroy:butadiene] and [destroy:styrene].
destroy.reaction.aibn_synthesis.descript: A two-step synthesis in reality, which produces the {radical initiator, destroy:radical_initiator} [destroy:aibn].
destroy.reaction.andrussow_process.descr: A high-temperature platinum-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} method for the production of [destroy:hydrogen_cyanide].
destroy.reaction.anthraquinone_process.d: The second step in the production of [destroy:hydrogen_peroxide] by the {reduction, destroy:reduction} of [destroy:oxygen] by [destroy:ethylanthrahydroquinone].
destroy.reaction.anthraquinone_reduction: The first step in the production of [destroy:hydrogen_peroxide] - {hydrogenating, destroy:hydrogenation} [destroy:ethylanthraquinone].
destroy.reaction.baby_blue_precipitation: The addition of {ions, destroy:ion} to the solution increases its {polarity, destroy:polarity}, causing the [destroy:methyl_salicylate] to {precipitate, destroy:precipitation}.
destroy.reaction.basic_diels_alder_react: A Diels-Alder reaction is a type of {cyclization, destroy:cycle} that occurs between a {diene, destroy:diene} and a {dienophile, destroy:dienophile}.
destroy.reaction.benzene_ethylation.desc: An {acid, destroy:acid}-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} method to produce [destroy:ethylbenzene].
destroy.reaction.benzene_nitration.descr: A method for the production of [destroy:trinitrotoluene] by reacting [destroy:toluene] with [destroy:nitric_acid] and [destroy:sulfuric_acid].
destroy.reaction.carbon_capture.descript: A method of {sequestering, destroy:sequestration} [destroy:carbon_dioxide] by reaction with calcium oxide.
destroy.reaction.carbon_tetrachloride_fl: The {substitution, destroy:substitution} of chlorine for fluorine in [destroy:carbon_tetrachloride] to produce various fluorinated products.
destroy.reaction.cellulose_nitration.des: A method for the production of Nitrocellulose by reacting cellulose with [destroy:nitric_acid] and [destroy:sulfuric_acid].
destroy.reaction.chlorine_haloform_react: Repeated chlorination of the slightly {acidic, destroy:acid} {ketone, destroy:ketone} group, followed by a {nucleophilic, destroy:nucleophile} {substitution, destroy:substitution} to form a carboxylate.
destroy.reaction.chlorine_solvation.desc: The reversible dissolution of [destroy:chlorine] in [destroy:water] under UV light.
destroy.reaction.chloroform_fluorination: A method for the production of [destroy:chlorodifluoromethane], a refrigerant and PTFE precursor.
destroy.reaction.cisplatin_synthesis.des: A method for the production of the chemotherapeutic medicine [destroy:cisplatin].
destroy.reaction.cordite_precipitation.d: The formation of the explosive Cordite.
destroy.reaction.contact_process.descrip: The {oxidation, destroy:oxidation} of [destroy:sulfur_dioxide]. The 'Magic' Oxidant will be removed in the full release of Destroy.
destroy.reaction.copper_dissolution.desc: The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of copper in {acid, destroy:acid}.
The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of copper ore in {acid, destroy:acid} allowing for ore tripling.
destroy.reaction.cumene_process.descript: A method of producing [destroy:phenol] and [destroy:acetone] by the {oxidation, destroy:oxidation} of [destroy:benzene] and [destroy:propene], via a {free radical, destroy:radical} {mechanism, destroy:mechanism}.
destroy.reaction.cyclohexene_oxidative_c: A reaction about which little is known, as no chemist has ever been able to actually observe cleavage up close.
destroy.reaction.ethylanthraquinone_synt: A method for the production of [destroy:ethylanthraquinone].
destroy.reaction.ethylbenzene_dehydrogen: The de{hydrogenation, destroy:hydrogenation} of [destroy:ethylbenzene] by superheated steam to produce [destroy:styrene].
destroy.reaction.ethylbenzene_transalkyl: The {transalkylation, destroy:transalkylation} of [destroy:ethylbenzene] to produce {mixed xylenes, destroy:mixed_xylenes}.
destroy.reaction.fluorite_dissolution.de: The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of Fluorite in {acid, destroy:acid}.
destroy.reaction.gold_dissolution.descri: The {dissolving, destroy:solution} of gold in {aqua regia, destroy:aqua_regia}. Funnily enough, you will need 24 carrots to produce 24-karat gold.
destroy.reaction.glycerol_nitration.desc: A method for the production of [destroy:nitroglycerine] (dynamite) by reacting [destroy:glycerol] with [destroy:nitric_acid] and [destroy:sulfuric_acid].
destroy.reaction.haber_process.descripti: Also known as the 'Haber' process, but Fritz Haber was a radical German nationalist obsessed with chemical weapons.
destroy.reaction.hydrogen_chloride_synth: A synthesis of [destroy:hydrochloric_acid] from its constituent elements.
destroy.reaction.hydrogen_iodide_synthes: A method for the production of [destroy:hydrogen_iodide].
destroy.reaction.hydroxide_neutralizatio: The reaction of an {acid, destroy:acid} and a {base, destroy:base} to produce [destroy:water].
The {disproportionation, destroy:disproportionation} of [destroy:chlorine] with sodium hydroxide.
destroy.reaction.iron_dissolution.descri: The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of iron in {acid, destroy:acid}.
destroy.reaction.iron_ore_dissolution.de: The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of iron ore in {acid, destroy:acid} allowing for ore tripling.
destroy.reaction.kelp_dissolution.descri: The extract of [destroy:iodine] from kelp by {dissolving, destroy:solution} it in [destroy:ethanol].
destroy.reaction.mercury_fulmination.des: An antique method for the production of the primary explosive, fulminated mercury.
destroy.reaction.metaxylene_transalkylat: The {transalkylation, destroy:transalkylation} of [destroy:metaxylene] to produce {mixed xylenes, destroy:mixed_xylenes}.
destroy.reaction.methanol_synthesis.desc: A method for the produciton of [destroy:methanol] from {syngas, destroy:syngas}.
destroy.reaction.methyl_acetate_carbonyl: A method for the production of [destroy:acetic_anhydride] by the {carbonylation, destroy:carbonylation} of [destroy:methyl_acetate].
destroy.reaction.nhn_synthesis.descripti: A method for the production of nickel hydrazine nitrate.
destroy.reaction.nickel_dissolution.desc: The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of nickel in {acid, destroy:acid}.
The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of nickel ore in {acid, destroy:acid} allowing for ore tripling.
destroy.reaction.nitronium_formation.des: The [destroy:nitronium] ion is formed in 'nitrating acid' - it is an {electrophile, destroy:electrophile} which reacts to form many explosives.
destroy.reaction.orthoxylene_oxidation.d: The [destroy:mercury]-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} {oxidation, destroy:oxidation} of [destroy:orthoxylene] to [destroy:phthalic_anhydride] in air.
destroy.reaction.orthoxylene_transalkyla: The {transalkylation, destroy:transalkylation} of [destroy:orthoxylene] to produce {mixed xylenes, destroy:mixed_xylenes}.
destroy.reaction.ostwald_process.descrip: A rhodium-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} method for the production of [destroy:nitric_acid]. The Ostwald Process is closely linked to the Haber Process.
destroy.reaction.paraxylene_transalkylat: The {transalkylation, destroy:transalkylation} of [destroy:paraxylene] to produce {mixed xylenes, destroy:mixed_xylenes}.
destroy.reaction.peroxide_process.descri: The {ketone, destroy:ketone}-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} {oxidation, destroy:oxidation} of [destroy:ammonia] to [destroy:hydrazine].
destroy.reaction.tatp.description: A dangerous way of producing an explosive, which has injured many an amatuer chemist.
destroy.reaction.toluene_transalkylation: The {transalkylation, destroy:transalkylation} of [destroy:toluene] to produce {mixed xylenes, destroy:mixed_xylenes} and [destroy:benzene].
The synthesis of the contact explosive 'Touch Powder' by soaking [destroy:iodine] in [destroy:ammonia].
destroy.reaction.steam_reformation.descr: A method for the production of {syngas, destroy:syngas}.
destroy.reaction.styrene_butadiene_copol: The {free-radical, destroy:radical} {addition copolymerization, destroy:addition_polymer} of [destroy:styrene] and [destroy:butadiene].
destroy.reaction.sodium_dissolution.desc: The violent reaction of [destroy:sodium] and [destroy:water] that earns the {alkali, destroy:base} metals their name.
destroy.reaction.vinyl_acetate_synthesis: A palladium-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} method for the production of [destroy:vinyl_acetate].
destroy.reaction.zinc_dissolution.descri: The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of zinc in {acid, destroy:acid}.
destroy.reaction.zinc_ore_dissolution.de: The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of zinc ore in {acid, destroy:acid} allowing for ore tripling.
destroy.tooltip.basin.too_full.title: Overfilled:
destroy.tooltip.basin.too_full: This Basin will _overflow_ if it reacts. Try a _Vat_ instead.
destroy.tooltip.coaxial_gear.shaft_too_s: Shafts must be at least two blocks in length to go through a Coaxial Cogwheel
destroy.tooltip.contamination: This item is contaminated with _%1$s_. If taken off, this may be harmful. _Decontaminate_ by washing with an Encased Fan.
destroy.tooltip.eating_prevented.baby_bl: You don't feel hungry right now
destroy.tooltip.eating_prevented.gas_mas: Your protective facewear blocks your mouth
destroy.tooltip.liable_to_change: This feature is likely to be _removed_ or _heavily modified_ in the full release of Destroy. (You can disable this message in configs).
destroy.tooltip.mixture_ingredient.molec: Must contain _%1$s_ at a concentration of approximately _%2$sM_. All other molecules must be _solvents_ or _low in concentration_.
destroy.tooltip.mixture_ingredient.anion: Must contain _%1$s_ at a concentration of approximately _%2$sM_. All other molecules must be _cations_, _solvents_ or _low in concentration_.
destroy.tooltip.mixture_ingredient.catio: Must contain _%1$s_ at a concentration of approximately _%2$sM_. All other molecules must be _anions_, _solvents_ or _low in concentration_.
destroy.tooltip.mixture_ingredient.molec: Must contain molecules with the following tag:
The _combined concentration_ of these Molecules must be _%1$s_. All other molecules must be _solvents_ or _low in concentration_. Remember you can _search_ for the tag in JEI.
destroy.tooltip.mixture_ingredient.refri: For best results, use _high concentration_ refrigerants. Remember you can _search_ for 'Refrigerant' in JEI.
destroy.tooltip.reaction.item_reactant: Allows _%1$s moles_ of reaction to occur
destroy.tooltip.reaction.order: The order of reaction with respect to this species is _%1$s_
destroy.tooltip.reaction.product_ratio.s: _每摩尔_反应产生_1摩尔_这种物质。
destroy.tooltip.reaction.product_ratio.p: _每摩尔_反应产生_%1$s摩尔_这种物质。
_每摩尔_反应消耗_1摩尔_这种物质。
_每摩尔_反应消耗_%1$s摩尔_这种物质。
destroy.tooltip.redstone_programmer.mode: 充能时暂停或启动设备。如果流程结束则重新启动
充能时重新开始，即使设备正在运作。结束后不重新启动。
Only play if powered, and pause otherwise. If the end is reached, restart.
Only play if powered. Pause and restart if not powered. Don't restart from the end.
Only play if powered. Pause and restart if not powered. If the end is reached, restart.
destroy.tooltip.seismometer.crude_oil: There are about %1$s bucket(s) of Crude Oil in this chunk
destroy.tooltip.vat.menu.controls: Scroll to see more information. Hold shift to scroll horizontally.
destroy.tooltip.vat.menu.title: Vat
destroy.tooltip.vat.not_initialized: A valid Vat could _not_ be formed. _Click_ to try again, or _Ponder_ the _Vat Controller_ to learn more.
destroy.tooltip.vat.not_submerged: This pipe is _above_ the level of Mixture in this Vat. It can _still insert_ Mixtures, but can _only extract gases_.
destroy.tooltip.vat.reacting: The Mixture in this Vat is constantly changing. It will be difficult to extract it.
destroy.tooltip.vat_material.conductivit: The lower the _conductivity_ of _all_ side blocks, the slower the Vat loses and gains _heat_.
destroy.tooltip.vat_material.pressure.de: The lower the _maximum pressure_ of _any_ side block, the less _gas_ can fit inside the Vat before it _explodes_.
destroy.tooltip.vat_material.transparent: Transparent blocks can transmit _ultraviolet light_, which is needed for some reactions.
destroy.tooltip.vat_material.vat_control: A _single_ Vat Controller is needed to make a Vat. They can withstand _any pressure_ difference, do _not conduct_ heat, an are _opaque_.
effect.destroy.cancer.description: _游戏内没有任何影响_。坍毁化合里的许多东西都是玩笑，但_癌症不是其中之一_。这里是为了_提高_职业性接触，以及_对臭氧层的危害_这两者与癌症风险增加之间的联系的_认识_。请参阅“_cancerresearchuk.org_”的专业信息源。这个效果可以被_顺铂_移除。
effect.destroy.chemical_poison.descripti: 持续伤害，但是仅剩半颗心时_不会停止_。
effect.destroy.fragrance.description: 免受_难闻化学物质_对使用者的影响。
effect.destroy.hangover.description: 每当听到_响声_都会受到伤害；可被_阿司匹林_治愈。
effect.destroy.inebriation.description: 使你_走路打滑_；更高的等级还会引起反胃、失明甚至_酒精中毒_。如果你醉酒了，你可以在炼药锅中_释放你自己_。
effect.destroy.baby_blue_high.descriptio: 获得速度，力量和急迫效果，但_有成瘾性_；亢奋退去的时候，本人会经历一段时间的_戒断反应_，取决于他们的成瘾程度。高成瘾性可能会_过量吸食_。
effect.destroy.baby_blue_withdrawal.desc: 导致缓慢、虚弱和挖掘疲劳，并且_拒绝进食_；只能通过服用_更多蓝精灵_来消除。
effect.destroy.sun_protection.descriptio: 获得一定时间的_防晒_效果，防晒可以在世界的_臭氧水平_较低时使使用者免受_紫外线辐射_的伤害。
item.destroy.anfo.tooltip.summary: Read that again slowly. That's right, _an foe_. ANFO is _not your friend_.
item.destroy.aspirin_syringe.tooltip.sum: 这是治疗_偏头痛_的最佳药物
item.destroy.aspirin_syringe.tooltip.con: 将注射器放在副手且主手为空时鼠标右击
item.destroy.baby_blue_powder.tooltip.be: 提供一个强烈、短暂的_蓝精灵亢奋_，接着是_蓝精灵戒断反应_。
item.destroy.baby_blue_syringe.tooltip.s: 99.1%纯度。提供一个较弱、短暂的_蓝精灵亢奋_，接着是_蓝精灵戒断反应_。
item.destroy.baby_blue_syringe.tooltip.c: 将注射器放在副手且主手为空时鼠标右击
item.destroy.bangers_and_mash.tooltip.su: 一种用来治疗亢奋的英国药物。
item.destroy.bomb_bon.tooltip.summary: 这个美味的_烈焰人燃烧室_小点心比_跳跳糖_来的更有感觉。
item.destroy.bomb_bon.tooltip.condition1: 用作土豆加农炮的弹药时
item.destroy.bucket_and_spade.tooltip.su: 一个历久弥新的英国玩具，连续玩上_几分钟_真的很有趣
item.destroy.bucket_and_spade.tooltip.be: 这个_小村民_会试着造一个_沙堡_，看到沙堡被摧毁时他会_非常难过_。
item.destroy.chorus_wine_bottle.dynamic_: 一种由_紫颂果_制成的可口饮料。发酵过程使紫颂果的_能力得到增强_。
获得_醉酒_效果并在安全的前提下传送到你_%1$s_秒前的位置。
item.destroy.cisplatin_syringe.tooltip.s: 一种现实生活中的化疗药物。你可以在_cancerresearch.uk_上了解更多信息并支持该疗法的研究。
item.destroy.cisplatin_syringe.tooltip.c: 将注射器放在副手且主手为空时鼠标右击
item.destroy.cisplatin_syringe.tooltip.b: 移除_癌情告知_弹出提示。
item.destroy.coal_infused_beetroot.toolt: _圣诞老人_给予_顽皮农民_的礼物
用作土豆加农炮的弹药时
item.destroy.copper_infused_beetroot.too: _富铜_意味着这个_甜菜_上_电流滋滋作响_。
用作土豆加农炮的弹药时
item.destroy.diamond_infused_beetroot.to: 富集了_成千上万坚硬的小碎块_，善于_撕裂_胃壁。
用作土豆加农炮的弹药时
item.destroy.emerald_infused_beetroot.to: 富集了_绿柱石_, 对一个人的跳跃肌肉来说非常“莓”好。(免责声明：观点不实。绿柱石具有慢性毒性。)
用作土豆加农炮的弹药时
使目标获得_跳跃提升_效果。
item.destroy.fluorite_infused_beetroot.t: 一个_隐隐发光_的样本，使人膝盖_虚弱_。还有胳膊。事实上，_全身各处_。
用作土豆加农炮的弹药时
在说服_精神错乱的墨西哥毒贩_时格外有效。
item.destroy.gas_mask.tooltip.summary: 安全地_过滤_穿戴者吸入的空气。
item.destroy.gas_mask.tooltip.behaviour1: 免受有毒和难闻化学物质的影响，但过滤效果会随着穿戴时间增加而减弱。
item.destroy.gold_infused_beetroot.toolt: 真金不会_褪色_，这个_甜菜根_也是。
用作土豆加农炮的弹药时
使目标获得_生命恢复_效果，
item.destroy.hazmat_leggings.tooltip.sum: 和_防毒面具_、_防护服上衣_及_长筒靴_一同穿戴可以使你免受危险物质的伤害。
item.destroy.hazmat_leggings.tooltip.beh: 免受腐蚀性化学物质的影响。
item.destroy.hazmat_suit.tooltip.summary: 和_防毒面具_、_防护服护腿_及_长筒靴_一同穿戴可以使你免受危险物质的伤害。
item.destroy.hazmat_suit.tooltip.behavio: 免受腐蚀性化学物质的影响。
item.destroy.hefty_beetroot.tooltip.summ: 这个_大号蔬菜_是_维生素_的_真实残留物_。
item.destroy.iodine.tooltip.summary: 一种暗灰色的固体，但无论你把它放在哪里，它都会留下_令人讨厌_的黄色污渍
item.destroy.iodine.tooltip.behaviour1: 释放像_龙息_一样可收集的紫色烟气。
item.destroy.iron_infused_beetroot.toolt: _甜菜根_的学名是_Beta Vulgaris_。但这个不是。这东西是甜菜头——_Alpha Bulgaris_。
用作土豆加农炮的弹药时
使目标获得_抗性提升_效果
item.destroy.lapis_infused_beetroot.tool: 充斥着什么像_魔法_一样的东西，那种使_附魔_运作的东西。
用作土豆加农炮的弹药时
item.destroy.magic_beetroot_seeds.toolti: 会生长为一种随机的_富矿物甜菜根_。
item.destroy.napalm_sundae.tooltip.summa: 唯一一种让你也能烧起来的冰淇淋风味。你的_烈焰人燃烧室_喜欢它到连碗都会吃掉。
item.destroy.nickel_infused_beetroot.too: 一种让人_想要更多_的_多汁_蔬菜
用作土豆加农炮的弹药时
item.destroy.perfume_bottle.tooltip.summ: 这种_绝妙的芬芳_甚至可以掩盖_最恶臭_的气味。
item.destroy.perfume_bottle.tooltip.beha: 免受_难闻_化学物质的影响。
REMOVEDitem.destroy.playwell.tooltip.sum: 任何与其他以砖为基础的建筑玩具的相似之处都是_完全巧合_。
REMOVEDitem.destroy.playwell.tooltip.beh: 这个_村民_将会盖一个_乐g——_我是说，_高乐_房子。看到房子被摧毁时他会_非常难过_。
item.destroy.polyethene_terephthalate: 聚对苯二甲酸乙二醇酯
item.destroy.potato_o.tooltip.summary: 为什么土德-欧们是_糟糕的骗子_？你能_轻易地看透它们_！
item.destroy.redstone_infused_beetroot.t: 灌注了味道糟糕的粉末使它属实_伤人_。
用作土豆加农炮的弹药时
使目标获得_瞬间伤害_效果。
item.destroy.seismometer.tooltip.summary: 用于确定_原油_有多接近的趁手工具。
item.destroy.seismometer.tooltip.behavio: 显示区块中_虚空原油_的储量。
item.destroy.sunscreen_bottle.tooltip.su: 保护你免受_天上那个大火球_的晒伤。
item.destroy.sunscreen_bottle.tooltip.be: 获得一定时间的_防晒_效果，防晒可以在世界的_臭氧水平_较低时使使用者免受_紫外辐射_的伤害。
item.destroy.swiss_army_knife.tooltip.su: 一种挖掘等级为_钻石_的_多功能工具_，可以当作_镐_、_斧_、_锹_、_锄_或_剪刀_使用
item.destroy.swiss_army_knife.tooltip.be: 可以切换到目标方块的_次要工具_（例如在瞄准草方块时切换为锄头而不是锹）。
item.destroy.tear_bottle.summary: 眼泪可以从_哭泣的_生物或玩家身上收集到。
item.destroy.test_tube.tooltip.summary: 一种可容纳_少量液体_混合物的容器。
item.destroy.test_tube.tooltip.behaviour: 在_试管_和_反应釜_之间_转移_液体。
item.destroy.thermite_brownie.tooltip.su: 这种布朗尼比普通的更加刺激。你的_烈焰人燃烧室_很喜欢它们。
item.destroy.touch_powder.tooltip.summar: 一种_极度敏感_的爆炸物，你稍微多_接触_它几下就可能会爆炸。用于制作_振动计_。
item.destroy.unprocessed_napalm_sundae: 凝固汽油冰淇凌（半成品）
item.destroy.urine_bottle.tooltip.summar: _哕！_不过这也是一个优秀的获取氨气的方式。_醉酒_时蹲在_炼药埚_上就可以获取尿液了。
item.destroy.wellington_boots.tooltip.su: 这些时髦的靴子是由威灵顿公爵手工制作的。和_防毒面具_ 、_防护服上衣_及_防护服护腿_一同穿戴可以使你免受危险物质的伤害。
item.destroy.wellington_boots.tooltip.be: 免受腐蚀性化学物质的影响。
item.destroy.white_wheat.tooltip.summary: 这种小麦是在_过去_一切东西都只有_黑色和白色_的时候吃的。
item.destroy.yeast.tooltip.summary: 这种有趣的真菌是一种_发酵_基。
item.destroy.ziegler-natta: 齐格勒-纳塔烯烃聚合催化剂
item.destroy.zinc_infused_beetroot.toolt: 含有令人精力充沛的_必需营养素_。
用作土豆加农炮的弹药时
